definitions.definition: important, pleasant, interesting, etc.; worth spending time, money or effort on
definitions.sensetop: worthwhile for somebody to do somethingworthwhile to do somethingworthwhile doing something

examples.text: It was in aid of a **worthwhile cause** *(= a charity, etc.)*.
The smile on her face made it all worthwhile.
We all felt we had done something worthwhile for the local community.
High prices in the UK **make it worthwhile** for buyers to look abroad.
examples.contextForm: worthwhile for somebody to do something

examples.text: **It is worthwhile to** include really high-quality illustrations.
It didn't seem worthwhile writing it all out again.
Their gratitude made it all worthwhile.
You might find it worthwhile to consult a financial adviser.
the pursuit of socially worthwhile goals
